channel.title: BLOB: Whirled Music
channel.description:
BLOBis a creative music trio from Woodstock, NY
BLOB members:Ted "Deadly Tedly" Orr GuitarAxon Midi Guitar John "Geeze" LindbergProcessed Upright BassHarvey "Mudcat"SorgenDrumsBass Clarinet
These podcasts are trailers from BLOB's ever growing catalog. BLOB records monthly at Sertso Studio. We encourage our fans to visit our store, where you can purchase digital downloads, hard copies and merch.BLOB's new CD, "You Can't Get There From There", will be available this fall. CLICK ME TO GO TO BLOB's STORE and pick up a copy of "Quantum Fugue."
channel.itunes:subtitle: Get BLOB CD's at http://johnlindberg.com/BLOB

item.title: BLOB: THIRD EAR
item.description: BLOB's 9th release , "THIRD EAR", features electronic sitarist, Curtis Bahn, along with BLOBsters John Lindberg, Ted Orr and Harvey Sorgen. Recorded at Sertso Studio in June 2011. Enjoy this yet untitled album excerpt.
